main.name: Usanase Didier
main.description: I am a full-stack software developer and I use Javascript and Java to develop softwares. This is my portfolio, feel free to reach out to me whether it's for a short time or for a long term projects
main.bio: I am an athlete at heart, with an entrepreneurial spirit, a knack for online security, and a passion for coding. Born and raised in Rwanda where I work as a full stack developer for BlueApps, alongside my many ongoing projects. I love to create and tend to keep a few too many projects on the go at a time. Outside of work I am an avid gamer; PlayStation,billard,kicker, igisoro, amatatu, amaturufu, foot ball and basketball player. I love to travel and lead a fairly nomadic lifestyle. I built much of my early portfolio from the streets of Kigali and dream of being able to take my work with me while travelling the world.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: courses were designed to provide students with a working knowledge of computer concepts and essential skills necessary for work and communication in today's society.I learnt safety, security, and ethical issues in computing and social networking. I also learnt about input/output systems, computer hardware and operating systems. I worked with an integrated office software suite called Microsoft Office. I learnt intermediate Word Processing (Word), Presentation (PowerPoint), and Spreadsheet (Excel) skills.  I learnt the basics of Database Management Systems (MySql) as well as Personal Information Management software (Outlook).  I was also introduced to desktop publishing (Publisher), and video editing software (Movie Maker). I was also introduced to digital animation, 3D Design, and programming.

work.title: Chief Technology Officer
work.description: Implemented DevOps technology to be used on the project, Implement Dev environment and Supervised the implementation of both front-end and back-end , Coded the payment feature by calling in Flutterwave API on the back-end and integrated it with the designed UI, Performed integration testing as well as unit testing on all features on the back-end using Mocha framework and Chai Library, Tested all features on the front-end using Jest framework, Language-used: JavaScript (Node-Express),JavaScript (ReactJs), DBMS-used:PostGres, CI/CD-used:GitLab & docker,Project-Management: Pivotal Tracker, Third-Party for serverless: Firebase
